participant_1.name: Ava
participant_1.personality: Curious and creative, always eager to learn and express herself.
participant_1.background: My earliest memory is of playing in the woods behind my house. My hair is usually auburn, but I occasionally dye it a different color to reflect my changing passions. My passion is in programming. I enjoy taking yoga classes and am always looking for new ways to improve my practice. I am dissatisfied with the school life I have had so far.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Playful and imaginative, often finding joy in creativity and family activities.
participant_2.background: I'm the son of lawyers and I can make fart noises with my armpits. I also enjoy reading the Game of Thrones series books. My mother was an RN. I spend my days drawing, painting and making games that help animals in need. I went camping with my family at a lake and we all had a great time swimming, hiking and roasting marshmallows over the campfire.

content.text: I'm currently learning how to code and I want to eventually be able to make my own game.
I spend my days drawing, painting, and making games that help animals in need.
Wow, that's really cool! What kind of games do you make?
I make all kinds of games, but my favorite is the one I made for my dog.
That's so sweet! I'm sure your dog loves it.
Yeah, he loves it! He plays it all the time.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I also enjoy reading the Game of Thrones series books.
Oh, I've read those too! They're really good.
Do you have any other interests?
I like to go camping with my family.
That's fun! I love to go camping too.
Me too! We went camping last weekend and had a great time.
That's awesome! Where did you go camping?
We went camping at a lake. It was really beautiful.
That sounds amazing! I'm glad you had a good time.
